title: ISic001497. Epitaph for Caius Terentius Symphorus
body:
Facsimile Images

C(aio) ((·)) Terentio ((·)) Symphoro
C(ai) ((·)) Terenti ((·)) Syntrop͡h͡i ((·)) lib(erto)
medico chir(urgo) ((·)) coh(ortis) ((·)) IIII
praet(oriae) ((·)) ann(orum) ((·)) XXIIX ((·)) huius
5 cura(m) ((·)) egit ((·)) Atticus ((ivy-leaf))

Apparatus criticus

Text after Bitto 2001

English translation

To Caius Terentius Symphorus, freedman of Caius Terentius Syntrophus, surgeon of the 4th Praetorian Cohort, died aged 28 (or 'surgeon for 28 years'). Atticus took care of this.

commentary
